snippet: The efforts came as the Republican-controlled House was expected to take up the measure this week.
abstract: Anti-hunger advocates rally to put pressure on lawmakers as Republican-controlled House prepares to take up food stamp bill that would cut about $40 billion from the program.
lead_paragraph: The efforts came as the Republican-controlled House was expected to take up the measure this week.

headline.main: Anti-Hunger Advocates Put Pressure on Lawmakers Over Food Stamp Bill
headline.print_headline: Anti-Hunger Advocates Put Pressure on Lawmakers Over Food Stamp Bill
